The researcher, when we took your covenant, reminds of a reminder of another banner, because he was greeting him, but he did that for their reconciliation, and the back of the covenant, and no one, Because what was taken on each one of them was taken over, it was one of the covenant, and perhaps it was with the perpetrators of peace be upon him, and when he was not?It was said: Before raising phase of the waw for the compassion, and it was said: for the state, and the phase was said: a mountain of mountains, which is an Arab, and it was said: Abbas that Moses, peace be upon him, did not come to them with the streaming, and the hardships in them were greater than them, and they are their acceptance, so he commanded Jabril, so he said: Until they accepted, and they were in the capacity
